chunks.text: Look, your Prashant Bhaiya does not tolerate injustice. Prashant Bhaiya saw that here hydrogen has become 8. Now if I want to make hydrogen equal, then what will I do? Here I will multiply by 4 to make it 8. Isn't it? That is, I will multiply by 4 on the product side.
